effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply nsurance! to their targets that heals them for 849,071 over 15 sec. nsurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 447,491.
Set: Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify apply nsurance! for 10 sec to one target while Apotheosis is active. Your healing is increased by 1% for each nsurance! active on allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Dealing damage has a high chance to grant you a dose of enomous Potential. At 5 doses, inject them into your target to deal 201,664 Nature damage over 3 sec.

Dealing Nature damage has a chance to grant you an additional dose.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 358 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 1,954, up to 9,774.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.1 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,602 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 924 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
